item.title: 2018 International Challenge - March tournament announced: All participants to receive 50 ...
item.description: The 2018 International Challenge - March tournament has been announced. All participants will receive a 50 Battle Points.
item.author: G50

item.title: Events for Pokémon Day 2018 Announced: To feature special tie ins on Snapchat and Twitter
item.description: Fans of the Pokémon world can expect much for the 2018 Pokémon Day, new Snapchat Lenses, and more, have been revealed for the Annual Celebration of all Things Pokémon on Feb. 27
item.author: Rhodehawk

item.title: Amazon make Pikachu Talk available to enable: Pikachu can talk through Amazon Alexa products
item.description: Pikachu Talk is now available on Amazon Alexa products. You can 'talk' to Pikachu through voice detection. It is free to enable on Amazon Alexa products.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Disney XD announces 'Pokémon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Adventures': First episode to ...
item.description: Disney XD to air the 21st English dubbed season of the anime starting March 24th.
item.author: Rhodehawk

item.title: Detective Pikachu demo announced: Demo, new characters, 3DS theme
item.description: In the video released by Nintendo, they showed the new 3DS theme, available by download code, a special demo version and showed off new characters.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Kyogre, Groudon returning to Gyms in Pokémon GO: From February 23 until March 5, 2018
item.description: Rayquaza is still available in the Gyms in Pokémon GO but Kyogre and Groudon have been added briefly to the Gyms from February 23 until March 5, 2018.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Regigigas, Heatran available to redeem in March: Code through Pokémon Club trainer newsletter ...
item.description: Regigigas and Heatran, available in March, are the next two Legendary Pokémon available to get in the year-long event.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Dragonite can now learn Draco Meteor in Pokémon GO: Learnt when evolving Dragonair during ...
item.description: Players can have their Dragonite know Draco Meteor if they evolve their Dragonair into a Dragonite during this month's Pokémon GO Community Day.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Shiny Poipole to be distributed in Japan: March 2nd, 2018 to April 9th, 2018
item.description: CoroCoro unveiled artwork showing Shiny Poipole and Naganadel. They will be distributed in Japan from March 2nd to April 9th through Serial code.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Pokémon GO honoring Lunar New Year with Safari Zone event: Safari Zone event at the Chiayi ...
item.description: There will be a special Safari Zone event at the Chiayi Lantern Festival in Taiwan, hosted by the local government from February 26 to March 3.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Master Ball available to redeem: For users who have Game Synced on Ultra Sun, Ultra Moon
item.description: If players have used Game Sync on Pokémon Ultra Sun or Ultra Moon with the Pokémon Global Link between November 17, 2017, and January 30, 2018, players can receive a Master Ball code.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Rita Ora joins Detective Pikachu cast: Her role in the film has been kept secret
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter announced on February 13th, 2018 that Rita Ora will join the film cast but her role has been kept secret.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: 2018 North American and World Championships locations revealed: To be held in Columbus, Ohio ...
item.description: This year's North American International Championships and World Championships tournaments will be held in Columbus, Ohio from July 6 to 8, and Nashville, Tennessee from Aug. 24 to 26, respectively.
item.author: Rhodehawk

item.title: Rayquaza, Plusle, Minun now available in Pokémon GO worldwide: New Hoenn Pokémon released on GO
item.description: Rayquaza is appearing in Raid battles atop Gyms and can only be caught with Premier Balls, which can be earned from defeating it. Plusle and Minun are available worldwide when previously region-locked.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Pokémon Ultra Sun, Ultra Moon updated to v1.2: Update released Feb. 6
item.description: A new software update for Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon, version 1.2, became available for download on Feb. 6, 2018.
item.author: Escparth
